original_text: I will forgive you if you agree to obey me. If you are ready to do that, you will again eat plenty of good food from the land.
korean_text: 너희가 즐겨 순종하면 땅의 아름다운 소산을 먹을 것이요

sentences.original_text: if you agree to obey me
If you are ready to do that
you will again eat plenty of good food
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 다시 풍성한 좋은 음식을 먹을 것이다
